document_data.name: Jaryd
document_data.mainbody: '''Jaryd''' was a guar who worked at the [[Szarr Palace]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Jaryd was an aged [[lightfoot halfling]] man with a receding hairline and light hair slicked back. He wore a [[breastplate]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Jaryd was one of three enthralled sentries who stood guard of the entrance to the massive Szarr Palace – home of [[vampire lord]] [[Cazador Szarr]] located in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate. On the day of the accession ritual, the palace's chamberlain [[Antwun Dufay‎]] ordered no visitor nor delivery to be allowed an entrance, promising a "reward" from Cazador upon the ritual's completion.
